column1: #text=My husband always wanted a lemon tree because he loves lemons .
#text=For his birthday we surprised him with one .
#text=We went to the nursery and bought the tree .
#text=We got it into the back of the truck and drove home .
#text=We got the tree into the back yard and he was very surprised .
#text=We all pitched in and dug up a big circle of grass in the back yard .
#text=We dug a big hole and put the tree in it .
#text=Using shovels we filled it in with some good purchased dirt that the nursery recommended .
#text=We got a bunch of bricks that were laying around against the fence and lined the bricks all around it .
#text=It 's been a year now and he has quite a few big green lemons .
#text=He ate one the other day even though it was n't ripe .
